unnormalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Automotive Buzz: New Wheels Hit the Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a tandoor in Delhi summer! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches, from pocket-friendly hatchbacks to luxury SUVs fit for a Maharaja.
normalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a tandoor in Delhi summer! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches, from pocket-friendly hatchbacks to luxury S U Vs fit for a Maharaja.

unnormalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki finally unveiled the much-awaited "Breeza Jr.," a compact SUV that aims to take on the Tata Punch. Rumors suggest it’ll be priced competitively, starting around Rs. 6 Lakhs.
normalised: First up, Maruti Suzuki finally unveiled the much-awaited "Breeza Junior," a compact S U V that aims to take on the Tata Punch. Rumors suggest it will be priced competitively, starting around rupee six lakh.

unnormalised: Then, Mahindra rolled out a souped-up version of the Scorpio, the "Scorpio Xtreme," boasting a powerful engine and enhanced off-roading capabilities perfect for those Leh-Ladakh adventures. Dr. Sharma from IIT-Madras says its new suspension is top-notch.
normalised: Then, Mahindra rolled out a souped-up version of the Scorpio, the "Scorpio Xtreme," boasting a powerful engine and enhanced off-roading capabilities perfect for those Leh-Ladakh adventures. Doctor Sharma from I I T-Madras says its new suspension is top-notch.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Hyundai launched the electric version of the Creta, promising a range of over 450 km on a single charge.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Hyundai launched the electric version of the Creta, promising a range of over four hundred and fifty kilometer on a single charge.

unnormalised: Finally, for the luxury segment, BMW introduced the new 7 Series, now with a swanky 100 sq ft panoramic sunroof. All these launches are certainly giving us a lot to look forward to. Buckle up, it’s going to be a thrilling ride! Jai Hind!
normalised: Finally, for the luxury segment, B M W introduced the new seven Series, now with a swanky one hundred square feet panoramic sunroof. All these launches are certainly giving us a lot to look forward to. Buckle up, it is going to be a thrilling ride! Jai Hind!
